actions.text: Amendment SA 960 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 60. Record Vote Number: 132.
Amendment SA 960 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S3712-3716; text: CR S3713-3714) To repeal the nutrition entitlement programs and establish a nutrition assistance block grant program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 960 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 960 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 60. Record Vote Number: 132.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 960 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 60. Record Vote Number: 132.

purpose: To repeal the nutrition entitlement programs and establish a nutrition assistance block grant program.
